title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services       Looking for a post office, gas station, lodging or a hospital? All these services are available in nearby communities. Kadoka, Philip and Wall Communities Kadoka is located 19 miles east of the Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Visitor Center. Restaurants, lodging, gasoline, postal services, city park, and a grocery store are available. For more information click on Kadoka Chamber of Commerce Philip is located 27 miles northeast of Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Visitor Center. Restaurants, lodging, gasoline, postal services, camping, city park and grocery store are available. For more information click on Philip Chamber of Commerce  Wall is located 21 miles west of Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Visitor Center. Restaurants, lodging, gasoline, postal services, city park and grocery store are available. For more information click on Wall Chamber of Commerce
